style="height:.664392em"><span style="top:-3.063em;margin-right:.05em"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathdefault mtight">n</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>，如果 n 是 2,3,4 较小的整数时，一般使用连乘更简单<br><code>x*x</code> <code>x*x*x</code> <code>x*x*x*x</code> ，避免使用 <code>pow(x,n)</code></p></blockquote><h3 id="自增自减运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#自增自减运算符">#</a> 自增自减运算符</h3><ul><li><p>前置 <code>++</code> ： <code>++i</code> ，前置 <code>--</code> ： <code>--i</code></p></li><li><p>后置 <code>++</code> ： <code>i++</code> ，后置 <code>--</code> ： <code>i--</code></p></li><li><p>双目运算（二元运算）：运算符需要两个操作数</p></li><li><p>单目运算（一元运算）：运算符需要一个操作数</p></li></ul><h4 id="作用"><a class="anchor" href="#作用">#</a> 作用</h4><ol><li>无论前置、后置， <code>++</code> 使变量自身加 1， <code>--</code> 使变量自身减 1。</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>m<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>n<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 相当于 n=n+1;</span><br>m<span class="token operator">--</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 相当于 m=m-1</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>n<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 结果 6</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>m<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 结果 9</span><br></pre></div></figure><ol start="2"><li>作为表达式时，<strong>前置</strong>运算符的结果是加 1 或减 1<strong> 之后</strong>的结果；<strong>后置</strong>运算符的结果是加 1 或减 1<strong> 之前</strong>的结果。</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br>12<br>13<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>m<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token punctuation">,</span>d<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 声明整型变量</span><br>a<span class="token operator">=</span>n<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <br>b<span class="token operator">=</span>m<span class="token operator">--</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"	"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>b<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"	"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>n<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'	'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>m<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token comment">// 5 10 6 9</span><br><br>n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>m<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">++</span>n<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">--</span>m<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"	"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>b<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"	"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>n<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'	'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>m<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token comment">// 6 9 6 9</span><br></pre></div></figure><h4 id="建议"><a class="anchor" href="#建议">#</a> 建议</h4><ol><li>使用单独的表达式语句</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">20</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>i<span class="token operator">--</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token operator">++</span>i<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token operator">--</span>i<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><ol start="2"><li>尽量不将其放入表达式中</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>a<span class="token operator">=</span>i<span class="token operator">++</span> <span class="token operator">+</span> i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'	'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'	'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 绝对不用</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="优先级"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级">#</a> 优先级</h3><ul><li><p>先乘除求余，后加减，级别相同的从左向右逐个计算<br><code>1+2*3</code> <code>2+3+4</code> <code>6*2/3</code></p></li><li><p>圆括号可以改变优先级<br><code>(1+2)*3</code></p></li><li><p>圆括号可以嵌套，越靠里，圆括号的优先级越高。<br><code>((1+2)*3+(2+3)*2)*7</code></p></li><li><p><code>%</code> 和 <code>*</code> <code>/</code> 优先级别相同</p></li><li><p>后置 <code>++</code> <code>--</code> 的优先级 &gt; 前置 <code>++</code> <code>--</code> 的优先级</p></li><li><p>前置 <code>++</code> <code>--</code> 的优先级 &gt; 乘除的优先级</p></li></ul><blockquote><p>建议使用圆括号，标明计算的优先顺序</p></blockquote><h3 id="运算的数据类型"><a class="anchor" href="#运算的数据类型">#</a> 运算的数据类型</h3><ul><li><p>相同类型的数据进行算术运算，结果还是这种数据类型。<br><code>1+2</code> <code>1-2</code> <code>1*2</code> <code>1/2</code><br><code>1.0+2.0</code> <code>1.0-2.0</code> <code>1.0*2.0</code> <code>1.0/2.0</code></p></li><li><p>不同类型的数据运算，默认向级别高的类型转换。<br>(低) <code>short</code> , <code>char</code> ➡️ <code>int</code> ➡️ <code>unsigned</code> ➡️ <code>long</code> ➡️ <code>double</code> (高)<br><code>1/2.0</code> <code>1.0/2</code></p></li></ul><blockquote><p>整数和整数运算结果是整数：<br>所以 <code>1/2</code> 结果为 0<br><code>1.0/2</code> 或 <code>1/2.0</code> 结果为 0.5</p></blockquote><ul><li>强制类型转换</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>类型<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>x 或 <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>类型<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token comment">// 将 x 转换为 &lt; 类型 > 的数据</span><br><span class="token comment">//x 可以是表达式</span><br><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">double</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>a<span class="token operator">/</span>b<br><span class="token keyword">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">3.0</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2.0</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token keyword">double</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <br><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">7</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">double</span> c<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token comment">// 若想得到 a 除 b 的实数结果，则</span><br>c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">double</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>a<span class="token operator">/</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="复合运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#复合运算符">#</a> 复合运算符</h3><p><code>+=</code> <code>-=</code> <code>*=</code> <code>/=</code> <code>%=</code></p><table><thead><tr><th>双目运算</th><th>等价于</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><code>a+=b;</code></td><td><code>a=a+b;</code></td></tr><tr><td><code>a-=b;</code></td><td><code>a=a-b;</code></td></tr><tr><td><code>a*=b;</code></td><td><code>a=a*b;</code></td></tr><tr><td><code>a/=b;</code></td><td><code>a=a/b;</code></td></tr><tr><td><code>a%=b;</code></td><td><code>a=a%b;</code></td></tr></tbody></table><h2 id="关系运算"><a class="anchor" href="#关系运算">#</a> 关系运算</h2><p>比较运算：<br>对数的 “大小” 关系的判断</p><h3 id="关系运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#关系运算符">#</a> 关系运算符</h3><table><tbody><tr><td><code>&gt;</code></td><td>大于</td></tr><tr><td><code>&lt;</code></td><td>小于</td></tr><tr><td><code>&gt;=</code></td><td>大于等于</td></tr><tr><td><code>&lt;=</code></td><td>小于等于</td></tr><tr><td><code>==</code></td><td>等于</td></tr><tr><td><code>!=</code></td><td>不等于</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="关系表达式"><a class="anchor" href="#关系表达式">#</a> 关系表达式</h3><p>将两个表达式用关系运算符连接起来，构成<strong>关系表达式</strong>。</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>关系运算符<span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><p>其中的表达式可以是算术表达式、关系表达式、逻辑表达式、赋值表达式、字符表达式等</p><p>目前表达式的值类型应为整数类型或实数类型，如： <code>int</code> , <code>float</code> , <code>double</code> , <code>char</code> 或 <code>bool</code></p><p>每个表达式都有一个确定的值，它们有 “序” 关系</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">double</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">1.0</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">4.0</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3.0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>b<span class="token operator">*</span>b<span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">4.0</span><span class="token operator">*</span>a<span class="token operator">*</span>c <span class="token operator">==</span> <span class="token number">0</span><br>b<span class="token operator">*</span>b<span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">4.0</span><span class="token operator">*</span>a<span class="token operator">*</span>c <span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token number">0</span><br></pre></div></figure><p>一个常量，一个变量也是表达式。</p><h3 id="运算结果"><a class="anchor" href="#运算结果">#</a> 运算结果</h3><p>关系表达式的运算结果为逻辑值， <code>true</code> <code>false</code></p><p>逻辑值 <code>true</code> ，计算机中存的是 <code>1</code><br>逻辑值 <code>false</code> , 计算机中存的是 <code>0</code></p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code">cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">" "</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token boolean">false</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token comment">// 结果：1 0</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="优先级-2"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级-2">#</a> 优先级</h3><ul><li><p>从高到低：</p><ul><li>算术运算</li><li>关系运算 <code>&gt;</code> <code>&lt;</code> <code>&gt;=</code> <code>&lt;=</code></li><li>关系运算 <code>==</code> <code>!=</code></li><li>赋值运算、复合算术运算</li></ul></li><li><p>关系运算符的结合顺序：从左向右</p></li></ul><h3 id="注意事项"><a class="anchor" href="#注意事项">#</a> 注意事项</h3><ul><li>在判断两个表达式的值是否相等的时候，一定用两个等号，不能用一个等号</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br>12<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token macro property">#<span class="token directive keyword">include</span><span class="token string">&lt;iostream></span></span><br><span class="token keyword">using</span> <span class="token keyword">namespace</span> std<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> <span class="token function">main</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token punctuation">{</span><br> <span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">bool</span> f<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> cin<span class="token operator">>></span>a<span class="token operator">>></span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token operator">==</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> f<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token operator">==</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>f<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token punctuation">}</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>关系运算符不要连用<br><code>5&lt;x&lt;10</code> 表达式正确，但值永远是 <code>1</code></li></ul><h2 id="逻辑运算"><a class="anchor" href="#逻辑运算">#</a> 逻辑运算</h2><p>表达、判断多个条件之间的关系，同时成立、之一成立、不成立。</p><h3 id="逻辑运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#逻辑运算符">#</a> 逻辑运算符</h3><table><tbody><tr><td><code>&amp;&amp;</code></td><td>并且，逻辑 “与”</td><td>and</td></tr><tr><td><code>||</code></td><td>或，逻辑 “或”</td><td>or</td></tr><tr><td><code>!</code></td><td>不是，逻辑 “非”</td><td>not</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="逻辑表达式"><a class="anchor" href="#逻辑表达式">#</a> 逻辑表达式</h3><p>逻辑运算符和关系表达式或有数值的表达式连接，构成逻辑表达式。</p><ul><li>双目运算</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span><br><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">||</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>单目运算</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">!</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">double</span> x<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cin<span class="token operator">>></span>x<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>x<span class="token operator">>=</span><span class="token number">0</span> <span class="token operator">&amp;&amp;</span> x<span class="token operator">&lt;=</span><span class="token number">1</span> <span class="token comment">// x∈[0,1]</span><br>x<span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token number">0</span> <span class="token operator">||</span> x<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token number">1</span> <span class="token comment">// x ∉ [0,1]</span><br><span class="token operator">!</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token operator">>=</span><span class="token number">0</span> <span class="token operator">&amp;&amp;</span> x<span class="token operator">&lt;=</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment">// x ∉ [0,1]</span><br><span class="token operator">!</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment">//x 非负，x>=0</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="表达式的值"><a class="anchor" href="#表达式的值">#</a> 表达式的值</h3><p>逻辑值： <code>true</code> ， <code>false</code></p><ul><li>与运算 <code>&lt;条件1&gt; &amp;&amp; &lt;条件2&gt;</code> 两个都为 true ➡️ true</li></ul><table><thead><tr><th>条件 1</th><th>条件 2</th><th>结果</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>true</td><td>true</td><td>true</td></tr><tr><td>true</td><td>false</td><td>false</td></tr><tr><td>false</td><td>true</td><td>false</td></tr><tr><td>false</td><td>false</td><td>false</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>或运算 <code>&lt;条件1&gt;||&lt;条件2&gt;</code> 只要一个为 true ➡️ true</li></ul><table><thead><tr><th>条件 1</th><th>条件 2</th><th>结果</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>true</td><td>true</td><td>true</td></tr><tr><td>true</td><td>false</td><td>true</td></tr><tr><td>false</td><td>true</td><td>true</td></tr><tr><td>false</td><td>false</td><td>false</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>非运算 <code>!&lt;条件&gt;</code></li></ul><table><thead><tr><th>条件</th><th>结果</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>true</td><td>false</td></tr><tr><td>false</td><td>true</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="优先级-3"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级-3">#</a> 优先级</h3><ul><li>从高到低：<ul><li>逻辑非 <code>!</code> ，负号 <code>-</code></li><li>乘、除、求余 <code>*</code> <code>/</code> <code>%</code></li><li>加、减 <code>+</code> <code>-</code></li><li>大于小于 <code>&gt;</code> , <code>&gt;=</code> , <code>&lt;</code> , <code>&lt;=</code></li><li>等于不等于 <code>==</code> , <code>!=</code></li><li>逻辑与 <code>&amp;&amp;</code></li><li>逻辑或 <code>||</code></li></ul></li></ul><blockquote><p><code>!</code> 高于 算术运算 高于 关系运算 高于 <code>&amp;&amp;</code> 高于 <code>||</code></p></blockquote><ul><li>结合顺序：<ul><li><code>&amp;&amp;</code> , <code>||</code> 从左到右</li><li><code>！</code> 从右向左</li></ul></li></ul><h3 id="注意事项-2"><a class="anchor" href="#注意事项-2">#</a> 注意事项</h3><ul><li>单个变量或常量也可作为条件</li><li>逻辑表达式的短路求值 (short circuit evaluation)：如果判断了前面的条件，已经能得到表达式的结果，就不再计算后面的条件。</li></ul><h2 id="位运算"><a class="anchor" href="#位运算">#</a> 位运算</h2><ul><li>数据在计算机中是以二进制数的形式存放的。</li><li>位运算：对整数的二进制位进行的操作</li></ul><p><code>a=0110 1001B</code><br><code>b=0101 1110B</code></p><table><thead><tr><th colspan="2">最高位</th><th></th><th></th><th></th><th></th><th></th><th colspan="2">最低位</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td></td><td>7</td><td>6</td><td>5</td><td>4</td><td>3</td><td>2</td><td>1</td><td>0</td></tr><tr><td>a</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>b</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li><p>位运算只能对整数进行。</p></li><li><p>包括：与 (and)、或 (or)、取反 (not)、异或 (xor)、左移、右移</p><ul><li>按位 “与”、按位 “或”、按位 “异或” 为双目运算</li><li>按位 “取反” 为单目运算</li></ul></li></ul><h3 id="位运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#位运算符">#</a> 位运算符</h3><table><tbody><tr><td><code>&amp;</code></td><td>按位 “与”</td><td>and</td></tr><tr><td><code>|</code></td><td>按位 “或”</td><td>or</td></tr><tr><td><code>^</code></td><td>按位 “异或”</td><td>xor</td></tr><tr><td><code>&lt;&lt;</code></td><td>左移</td><td></td></tr><tr><td><code>&gt;&gt;</code></td><td>右移</td><td></td></tr><tr><td><code>~</code></td><td>按位 “取反”</td><td>not</td></tr></tbody></table><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>整数类型表达式<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>位运算符<span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>整数类型表达式<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span><br><span class="token operator">~</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>整数类型表达式<span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="运算结果-2"><a class="anchor" href="#运算结果-2">#</a> 运算结果</h3><ul><li>按位 “与”<br>全为 1 才为 1</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td>ai</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>bi</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>结果</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>按位 “或”<br>只要有一个为 1 即为 1</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td>ai</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>bi</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>结果</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>1</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>按位 “异或”<br>两个操作数不同则为 1<br>两个操作数相同则为 0</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td>ai</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>bi</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>结果</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>按位 “取反”</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td>ai</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>结果</td><td>1</td><td>0</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>移位运算<br>将二进制数的每一位 向左 或 向右 移动 指定的数位</li></ul><p>如：左移两位</p><table><thead><tr><th colspan="3">八位数</th><th>7</th><th>6</th><th>5</th><th>4</th><th>3</th><th>2</th><th>1</th><th>0</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td colspan="3">初始值</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>左移两位</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td colspan="2">空位补 0</td></tr><tr><td>结果值</td><td colspan="2">溢出抹去</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="优先级-4"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级-4">#</a> 优先级</h3><p><code>~</code> &gt; 算术运算 &gt; 比较运算 &gt; <code>&amp;</code> &gt; <code>^</code> &gt; <code>|</code></p><ul><li>从高到低</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td>按位反 <code>~</code> ，逻辑非 <code>!</code> ，负号 <code>-</code> ，前置 <code>++</code> <code>--</code></td><td>从右向左</td></tr><tr><td>算术 乘、除、求余 <code>*</code> <code>/</code> <code>%</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>算术 加、减 <code>+</code> <code>-</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>按位 左移 <code>&lt;&lt;</code> 、右移 <code>&gt;&gt;</code></td><td>从左向右</td></tr><tr><td>关系：大于小于 <code>&gt;</code> , <code>&gt;=</code> , <code>&lt;</code> , <code>&lt;=</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>关系：等于不等于 <code>==</code> , <code>!=</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>按位 与 <code>&amp;</code></td><td rowspan="3">从左向右</td></tr><tr><td>按位 异或 <code>^</code></td></tr><tr><td>按位 或 <code>|</code></td></tr><tr><td>逻辑 与 <code>&amp;&amp;</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>逻辑 或 <code>||</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>等号 <code>=</code></td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="应用"><a class="anchor" href="#应用">#</a> 应用</h3><ul><li>按位 “与” 可以将某些位设置为 <code>0</code></li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td></td><td>a=0110</td><td>1001B</td></tr><tr><td><code>&amp;</code></td><td>b=1111</td><td><strong>0000</strong>B</td></tr><tr><td></td><td>c =0110</td><td><strong>0000</strong>B</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>按位 “或” 可以将某些位设置为 <code>1</code></li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td></td><td>a=0110</td><td>1001B</td></tr><tr><td><code>|</code></td><td>b=<strong>1111</strong></td><td>0000B</td></tr><tr><td></td><td>c=<strong>1111</strong></td><td>1001B</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>按位 “异或” 可以让某些位变反，而另一些位不变<ul><li>和 1&quot;异或&quot; 变反<br>1^1 ➡️ 0<br>0^1 ➡️ 1</li><li>和 0&quot;异或&quot; 不变<br>1^0 ➡️ 1<br>0^0 ➡️ 0</li></ul></li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td></td><td>a=0110</td><td>1001B</td></tr><tr><td><code>^</code></td><td>b=1111</td><td>0000B</td></tr><tr><td></td><td>c=1001</td><td>1001B</td></tr></tbody></table><h3 id="复合位运算"><a class="anchor" href="#复合位运算">#</a> 复合位运算</h3><table><thead><tr><th></th><th></th><th colspan="2">等价于</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>复合与</td><td><code>&amp;=</code></td><td><code>x&amp;y=;</code></td><td><code>x=x&amp;y;</code></td></tr><tr><td>复合或</td><td><code>|=</code></td><td><code>x|y=;</code></td><td><code>x=x|y;</code></td></tr><tr><td>复合异或</td><td><code>^=</code></td><td><code>x^y=;</code></td><td><code>x=x^y;</code></td></tr><tr><td>复合左移</td><td><code>&lt;&lt;=</code></td><td><code>x&lt;&lt;=k;</code></td><td><code>x=x&lt;&lt;k;</code></td></tr><tr><td>复合右移</td><td><code>&gt;&gt;=</code></td><td><code>x&gt;&gt;=k;</code></td><td><code>x=x&gt;&gt;k;</code></td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>优先级：很低，与复合算术运算、等号同级</li><li>结合顺序：从右向左</li></ul><h3 id="注意事项-3"><a class="anchor" href="#注意事项-3">#</a> 注意事项</h3><ul><li>一个 <code>&amp;</code> 和两个 <code>&amp;&amp;</code> 是不同的</li><li>在输出中使用移位运算的表达式时，要加括号</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code">cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token number">4</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 结果 42</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">4</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 结果 16</span><br><span class="token comment">// 重载</span><br></pre></div></figure><h2 id="特殊运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#特殊运算符">#</a> 特殊运算符</h2><h3 id="赋值运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#赋值运算符">#</a> 赋值运算符</h3><p>等号 &quot;=&quot; 是赋值运算符</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>变量<span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><h4 id="作用-2"><a class="anchor" href="#作用-2">#</a> 作用</h4><ol><li>将右边表达式的值存入左边的变量中</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>c<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 赋值语句</span><br></pre></div></figure><ol start="2"><li>作为表达式，它的值就是右边 &lt;表达式&gt; 的值</li></ol><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>c<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 显示 8</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>c<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 显示 8</span><br></pre></div></figure><h4 id="优先级-5"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级-5">#</a> 优先级</h4><ul><li>优先级较低，低于逻辑运算，和复合算术运算和复<br>合位运算是同级的</li><li>结合顺序是从右向左。</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br><span class="marked">5</span><br>6<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y<span class="token punctuation">,</span>z<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>x<span class="token operator">=</span> y<span class="token operator">=</span> z <span class="token operator">=</span> a<span class="token operator">+</span>b <span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token comment">// x=( y= ( z = a+b ) ) ;</span><br><br><span class="marked">z<span class="token operator">=</span>x<span class="token operator">+</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span></span><br><span class="token comment">// [Error] lvalue required as left operand of assignment</span><br></pre></div></figure><h4 id="左值和右值"><a class="anchor" href="#左值和右值">#</a> 左值和右值</h4><ul><li><p>左值 lvalue</p><ul><li>能够出现在等号左边的式子</li><li>能够被赋值的量</li><li>变量、数组元素、对象等</li></ul></li><li><p>右值 rvalue</p><ul><li>有值的表达式</li></ul></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br></pre><pre class="code">z<span class="token operator">=</span>x<span class="token operator">+</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不正确</span><br>z<span class="token operator">=</span>x<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 正确</span><br><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>c<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br>x<span class="token operator">=</span> y<span class="token operator">=</span>z<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b <span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br>z<span class="token operator">=</span>x<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="字节数运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#字节数运算符">#</a> 字节数运算符</h3><p>求某类型的数据或表达式的值占的字节数</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">sizeof</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>常量、变量、数组、对象<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment">// 表达式的特例、</span><br><span class="token keyword">sizeof</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>类型<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token comment">// 用法象函数，叫运算符</span><br><span class="token keyword">sizeof</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br></pre></div></figure><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code">cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token keyword">sizeof</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">int</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">" "</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token keyword">sizeof</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="条件运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#条件运算符">#</a> 条件运算符</h3><p>条件运算符、问号运算符？：<br>三目运算</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>条件<span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">?</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><blockquote><p>&lt;表达式 1&gt; 和 &lt; 表达式 2&gt; 的值应具有相同的类型，或能转换为相同的类型</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code">y<span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span> t <span class="token operator">>=</span> <span class="token number">0</span> <span class="token operator">?</span> <span class="token number">1</span> <span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token number">0</span> <span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 正确</span><br>y<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span> x <span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token number">1</span> <span class="token operator">?</span> <span class="token number">1</span> <span class="token operator">:</span> <span class="token string">"error"</span> <span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 错误</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="逗号运算符"><a class="anchor" href="#逗号运算符">#</a> 逗号运算符</h3><p>逗号 &quot;,&quot; 是一个运算符<br>多个表达式用逗号隔开，构成逗号表达式。</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span> <span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式n<span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><p>从左向右依次计算 n 个表达式的值<br>整个表达式的值为 &lt;表达式 n&gt; 的值</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> y<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>y<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span>b<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token operator">=</span>c<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><br><span class="token comment">// 相当于</span><br>a<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>b<span class="token operator">=</span>b<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>c<span class="token operator">=</span>c<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>y<span class="token operator">=</span>c<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="优先级-6"><a class="anchor" href="#优先级-6">#</a> 优先级</h3><p>从高到低</p><table><tbody><tr><td><code>sizeof()</code> ，按位反 <code>~</code> ，逻辑非 <code>!</code> ，负号 <code>-</code> ，前置 <code>++</code> <code>--</code></td><td>从右向左<sup> 1</sup></td></tr><tr><td>算术 乘、除、求余 <code>*</code> <code>/</code> <code>%</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>算术 加、减 <code>+</code> <code>-</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>按位 左移 <code>&lt;&lt;</code> 、右移 <code>&gt;&gt;</code></td><td>从左向右</td></tr><tr><td>关系：大于小于 <code>&gt;</code> , <code>&gt;=</code> , <code>&lt;</code> , <code>&lt;=</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>关系：等于不等于 <code>==</code> , <code>!=</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>按位 与 <code>&amp;</code></td><td rowspan="3">从左向右</td></tr><tr><td>按位 异或 <code>^</code></td></tr><tr><td>按位 或 <code>|</code></td></tr><tr><td>逻辑 与 <code>&amp;&amp;</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>逻辑 或 <code>||</code></td><td></td></tr><tr><td>条件 <code>?</code> <code>:</code></td><td>从右向左<sup> 2</sup></td></tr><tr><td>赋值 <code>=</code> 、复合运算</td><td>从右向左<sup> 3</sup></td></tr><tr><td>逗号 <code>,</code></td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><h2 id="混合运算的类型转换"><a class="anchor" href="#混合运算的类型转换">#</a> 混合运算的类型转换</h2><ul><li>C++ 中允许相关的数据类型进行混合运算</li></ul><dl><dt>相关类型</dt><dd>尽管在程序中的数据类型不同，但逻辑上进行这种运算是合理的</dd></dl><ul><li>相关类型在混合运算时会自动进行类型转换，再计算</li></ul><h3 id="算术转换原则"><a class="anchor" href="#算术转换原则">#</a> 算术转换原则</h3><p>确保计算值的精度，转换后尽可能不丢失有效数字。</p><blockquote><p><code>short</code> ，2 字节，能表示的数小<br><code>int</code> ，4 字节，能表示的数大<br><code>int</code> 转 <code>short</code> ，要丢掉 2 字节的信息，<strong>不可取</strong><br><code>short</code> 转 <code>int</code> ，增加存储空间，但不丢失信息，可行</p></blockquote><h3 id="算术转换方式"><a class="anchor" href="#算术转换方式">#</a> 算术转换方式</h3><ul><li>字节少的向字节多的转换<br><code>char</code> , <code>unsigned char</code> , <code>short</code> , <code>unsigned short</code> , <code>bool</code> ➡️ <code>int</code></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code">cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">'a'</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><span class="token comment">//'a' 转换为 int 再加 5，结果为整型</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>精度低的向精度高的转换<br><code>int</code> ➡️ <code>float</code> ➡️ <code>double</code></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code">cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">3.5</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 5 转换为 double 型再相加，结果为 double</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>有符号向无符号转换<br><code>int</code> ➡️ <code>unsigned int</code></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">unsigned</span> <span class="token keyword">int</span> ui<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">32678</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">5</span><span class="token operator">+</span>ui<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//5 转换为 unsigned int</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="隐式转换时机"><a class="anchor" href="#隐式转换时机">#</a> 隐式转换时机</h3><ol><li>混合类型的表达式</li></ol><blockquote><p>char 和 int 相加，是字符的 ASCII 和整数相加。</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span><span>例子</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">char</span> c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'a'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>c<span class="token operator">+</span>n<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//'a' 的 ASCII 为 97，加 2 得整型 99</span><br></pre></div></figure><ol start="2"><li>赋值</li></ol><blockquote><p>向左值类型转换</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span><span>例子</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code">doube a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">8.12</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> k<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>k<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token punctuation">;</span><span class="token comment">//a 转换为 int，舍去小数，k 为 8</span><br></pre></div></figure><blockquote><p>double 赋值给 int, 会舍去小数<br>向低精度转换 会 损失有效数字</p></blockquote><blockquote><p>整型 / 整型 = 整型，3/2=1, 而不是 1.5<br>整型相除，结果为整型，小数会被舍去。</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">256</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">97</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">double</span> b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">256</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">97.625</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">char</span> c1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>c2<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>c1<span class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br>c2<span class="token operator">=</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 不推荐</span><br></pre></div></figure><ol start="3"><li>在需要关系、逻辑表达式的地方<br>非 0 转 true；0 转 false</li></ol><h3 id="显式转换"><a class="anchor" href="#显式转换">#</a> 显式转换</h3><p>程序中明确标记转换的类型，就是显式转换，也就是<strong>强制类型转换</strong></p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>类型<span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span>类型<span class="token operator">></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>表达式<span class="token operator">></span><br></pre></div></figure><p>优先级：高于乘法和除法，和逻辑非、按位取反同级<br>结合顺序：从右向左</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">double</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">128</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">30</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">double</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>n<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><span class="token comment">// 强制将 n 转换为 double</span><br>n<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token keyword">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token operator">/</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 强制将 a/b 的值转换为 int</span><br></pre></div></figure><h1 id="重点难点"><a class="anchor" href="#重点难点">#</a> 重点难点</h1><h2 id="整数-字符"><a class="anchor" href="#整数-字符">#</a> 整数、字符</h2><h3 id="整数"><a class="anchor" href="#整数">#</a> 整数</h3><ul><li>整数常量</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td><code>12</code></td><td>整型</td></tr><tr><td><code>12L</code></td><td>长整型</td></tr><tr><td><code>0x15</code></td><td>十六进制整数 15</td></tr><tr><td><code>015</code></td><td>八进制整数 15</td></tr><tr><td><code>12U</code></td><td>无符号数</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>整型变量</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> x<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">20</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="字符"><a class="anchor" href="#字符">#</a> 字符</h3><ul><li>字符常量</li></ul><table><tbody><tr><td><code>'a'</code></td><td>字母字符</td></tr><tr><td><code>'1'</code></td><td>数字字符</td></tr><tr><td><code>'	'</code></td><td>转义字符</td></tr><tr><td><code>'\x41'</code></td><td>转义字符，ASCII 码值是十六进制 41 的字符</td></tr><tr><td><code>\102</code></td><td>转义字符， ASCII 码值是八进制 102 的字符</td></tr></tbody></table><ul><li>字符变量</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">char</span> c<span class="token punctuation">,</span>d<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">char</span> e<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'A'</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>f<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'\0121'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="内存中存储形式"><a class="anchor" href="#内存中存储形式">#</a> 内存中存储形式</h3><blockquote><p>整数 <code>1</code> 在内存中存储的是其二进制形式： <code>00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001</code><br>字符 <code>'1'</code> 在内存中存储的是 <code>1</code> 这个字符的 ASCII 码值，即 <code>49</code> ，其二进制形式是 <code>0011 0001</code> ，实际也是个整数，只占一个字节！</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br>12<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token macro property">#<span class="token directive keyword">include</span> <span class="token string">&lt;iostream></span></span><br><span class="token keyword">using</span> <span class="token keyword">namespace</span> std<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> <span class="token function">main</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span><br> <span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">int</span> x<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">10</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>y<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">20</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">char</span> c<span class="token punctuation">,</span>d<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">char</span> e<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'A'</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>f<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'\121'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> a<span class="token operator">=</span>e<span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 即 65+2 = 67</span><br> e<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">98</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 即 'b'</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">" "</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>e<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token punctuation">}</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>整数和字符在内存中都是整数。<ul><li>整数，存放数的二进制形式。</li><li>字符，存放其 ASCII 码值。</li></ul></li><li>输出时，<ul><li>当整数看待，显示数的十进制形式。</li><li>当字符看待，显示的是 ASCII 值是这个数的字符（该数 &lt; 128）。</li></ul></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">65</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 等同于 int a='A';</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//65</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">char</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//A</span><br><br><span class="token keyword">char</span> c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'a'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 等同于 char c=97;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>c<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// a</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token keyword">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>c<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//97</span><br></pre></div></figure><blockquote><p>可以给整型变量赋字符值，也可以给字符变量赋整数值，关键是输出时把它们当什么看待。</p></blockquote><h2 id="字符串-2"><a class="anchor" href="#字符串-2">#</a> 字符串</h2><ul><li><p>字符串常量<br><code>&quot;zhang&quot;</code> , <code>&quot;wang&quot;</code> , <code>&quot;Hello world&quot;</code></p></li><li><p>字符串 “变量”</p></li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">char</span> name<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">40</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">"zhang"</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h3 id="内存中存储形式-2"><a class="anchor" href="#内存中存储形式-2">#</a> 内存中存储形式</h3><p>内存中， <code>name</code> 称为字符数组，最多可放 40 个字节大小的字符。</p><table><tbody><tr><td>字节编号</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>2</td><td>3</td><td>4</td><td>5</td><td>...</td><td>39</td></tr><tr><td>字符</td><td><code>'z'</code></td><td><code>'h'</code></td><td><code>'a'</code></td><td><code>'n'</code></td><td><code>'g'</code></td><td><code>\0</code></td><td>...</td><td></td></tr><tr><td>内存中实际存储的 ASCII</td><td>122</td><td>104</td><td>97</td><td>110</td><td>103</td><td>0<sup> 结束符</sup></td><td>...</td><td></td></tr></tbody></table><p><code>name</code> 中的每一个字符可以通过 <code>name[i]</code> 下标来表示， <code>i=0,...n-1</code> 。<br><code>n</code> 是字符串的长度，对 <code>&quot;zhang&quot;</code> 来说，n=5</p><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">int</span> i<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>k<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>name<span class="token punctuation">[</span>i<span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'c'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>name<span class="token punctuation">[</span>i<span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><br>k<span class="token operator">=</span>name<span class="token punctuation">[</span>i<span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token string">'a'</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 这里的 'a' 等同于 97</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>k<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><h2 id="转义字符-2"><a class="anchor" href="#转义字符-2">#</a> 转义字符</h2><ul><li>可显示字符，可以键盘直接输入</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">char</span> c<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'A'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li>不可显示字符，不能直接输入<br>ASCII 码值在 0-32 之间的字符是控制符号，不能显示到屏幕，是不可显示字符。</li></ul><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token keyword">char</span> d<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'
'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"zhang"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>d<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"xjtu"</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br>cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">"zhang
xjtu
"</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br></pre></div></figure><ul><li><p>C++ 中，单引号表示字符，双引号表示字符串，反斜杠表示转义<br>如需要显示，则单引号 <code>\'</code> ，双引号 <code>\&quot;</code> ，反斜杠 <code>\</code></p></li><li><p>表示八进制、十六进制<br><code>\</code> + 三位数字 (0-7)：八进制 ASCII，数值上小于 128，如 <code>\ddd</code> ： <code>\</code> + ddd 八进制 ASCII<br><code>\x</code> + 两位数字 (0-9) 或字母 (A-F)：十六进制 ASCII，如 <code>\xhh</code> ： <code>\x</code> + hh 十六进制 ASCII</p><blockquote><p><code>
</code> <code>\12</code> <code>\x0A</code> 表示换行<br><code>\41</code> <code>\041</code> <code>\x21</code> 表示 <code>'!'</code><br><code>\60</code> <code>\060</code> <code>\x30</code> 表示字符 <code>'0'</code><br><code>\101</code> <code>\x41</code> 表示 <code>'A'</code><br><code>\141</code> <code>\x61</code> 表示 <code>'a'</code><br><code>\7</code> <code>\07</code> <code>\007</code> <code>\x7</code> 表示响铃</p></blockquote><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br>12<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token macro property">#<span class="token directive keyword">include</span> <span class="token string">&lt;iostream></span></span><br><span class="token keyword">using</span> <span class="token keyword">namespace</span> std<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> <span class="token function">main</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token punctuation">{</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\41'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\041'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\x21'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// '!'</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\60'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\060'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\x30'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//'0'</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'
'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\12'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\x0A'</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 换行</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\101'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\x41'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//'A '</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\141'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\x61'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">//'a'</span><br> cout<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">'\7'</span><span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span>endl<span class="token punctuation">;</span> <span class="token comment">// 响铃</span><br> <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token punctuation">}</span><br></pre></div></figure></li></ul><h3 id="常见转义符"><a class="anchor" href="#常见转义符">#</a> 常见转义符</h3><table><thead><tr><th>转义符</th><th>含义</th><th>ASCII 十进制</th><th>转义符</th><th>含义</th><th>ASCII 十进制</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><code>\0</code></td><td>空字符</td><td>0</td><td><code></code></td><td>回车</td><td>13</td></tr><tr><td><code>\a</code></td><td>响铃</td><td>7</td><td><code>\&quot;</code></td><td>双引号</td><td>34</td></tr><tr><td><code> </code></td><td>退格</td><td>8</td><td><code>\'</code></td><td>单引号</td><td>39</td></tr><tr><td><code>	</code></td><td>水平制表</td><td>9</td><td><code>\</code></td><td>反斜杠</td><td>92</td></tr><tr><td><code>
</code></td><td>换行</td><td>10</td><td><code>\ddd</code></td><td>任意字符</td><td>ddd 八进制</td></tr><tr><td><code>\v</code></td><td>垂直制表</td><td>11</td><td><code>\xhh</code></td><td>任意字符</td><td>hh 十六进制</td></tr><tr><td><code> </code></td><td>换页</td><td>12</td></tr></tbody></table><blockquote><p>回车：回到本行开头<br>换行：换到下一行开头</p></blockquote><h1 id="课堂讨论"><a class="anchor" href="#课堂讨论">#</a> 课堂讨论</h1><ol><li>说说数据和数据类型的区别和联系？为什么要有数据类型？</li></ol><blockquote><ul><li>区别：<br>数据：具体的数字或字符，如 <code>1</code> <code>2</code> <code>3</code> 等等。<br>数据类型：是对数据的分类，包括整型、浮点型、字符型、布尔型等。</li><li>联系：<br>数据类型是具有相同性质数据的一个集合。</li><li>为什么要有数据类型？<br>有了数据类型，可以将数据进行分类。分成所需内存大小不同的数据，可节省空间、充分利用内存，加快电脑的编译速度。</li></ul></blockquote><ol start="2"><li>整数，有符号，在计算机中是如何存储的？</li></ol><blockquote><ul><li><p>计算机中整数是以二进制补码形式进行存储的。</p></li><li><p>计算机中将整数分为无符号整数 (unsigned) 和有符号整数 (signed)。</p><ul><li>对于无符号整数，它的原码、反码、补码都是相同的，直接采用其二进制形式表示即可。</li><li>对于有符号整数，规定取最高位作为其符号位，若最高位为 0 表示正数，否则为负数。<br>其原码、反码、补码之间的关系是：反码等于原码除符号位全部取反；补码等于反码 + 1。</li></ul><p>例子：</p><ul><li>计算机中存一个字节的 <code>1</code> ：<br>0 <sup>符号位</sup> 000000 <sup>补足的 0</sup> 1 <sup>1 的二进制值</sup><br>正数存的其实也是补码，不过正数的补码即是它本身<br>所以计算机就存： <code>00000001</code></li><li>计算机中存一个字节的 <code>-1</code> ：<br>先取 <code>+1</code> 的值：<br>0 <sup>符号位</sup> 000000 <sup>补足的 0</sup> 1 <sup>1 的二进制值</sup><br>取反：<br>1 <sup>取反</sup> 111111<sup> 取反</sup> 0 <sup>取反</sup><br>取补码：即反码 + 1<br>1 111111 1<br>所以计算机就存： <code>11111111</code></li></ul></li></ul></blockquote><ol start="3"><li>什么是浮点数？浮点数在计算机中是如何存储的？</li></ol><blockquote><ul><li>浮点数是属于有理数中某特定子集的数的数字表示，在计算机中用以近似表示任意某个实数。</li><li>浮点数的存储有单精度 float 类型和双精度 double 类型，这两种数据类型都是遵循 IEEE 标准的，float 以 32 位长度存储数据，double 以 64 位长度存储数据。</li><li>两种存储类型的基本格式是一致的，都是使用二进制科学表示法。<br>二进制科学表示法的公式为：S=M*2<sup>N</sup> ，即数据主要由三部分构成：符号位<sup> 0 正 1 负</sup> + 阶码<sup>指数位 N</sup> <sup>采用移位存储</sup> + 尾数位<sup> M</sup>。<ul><li>float 型数据，其二进制有 32 位，其中符号位 1 位，阶码 8 位，尾数 23 位；</li><li>double 型数据，其二进制为 64 位，符号位 1 位，阶码 11 位，尾数 52 位。</li></ul></li></ul></blockquote><ol start="4"><li>什么时候需要位运算？</li></ol><blockquote><ul><li>需要快速清零：和 0 按位与。</li><li>保留指定位：和另一个二进制数按位异</li><li>判断奇偶：和 1 按位与，偶数为 0，奇数为 1</li><li>设定指定位的数据：给某一位取反，交换数值的时候。</li><li>乘以 2，除以 2<br><code>i&lt;&lt;1</code> 和 <code>i&gt;&gt;1</code> 的效率比 <code>i*2</code> 和 <code>i/2</code> 更高。<br><code>i&lt;&lt;N</code> 效率比 <code>2^N</code> 效率更高。</li></ul></blockquote><h1 id="随堂练习"><a class="anchor" href="#随堂练习">#</a> 随堂练习</h1><ol><li class="quiz"><p>32 位系统中，C++ 的 int 型数据占的空间一般为 <span class="gap"></span> 字节。</p><ul class="options"><li>8</li><li>2</li><li class="correct">4</li><li>10</li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>下列哪个是 C++ 语言的合法的字符常量 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li><code>&quot;\0&quot;</code></li><li><code>'054'</code></li><li class="correct"><code>'\x89'</code></li><li><code>'\092'</code></li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>设 n=10，i=4，则执行赋值运算 n=n%(i-1) 后，n 的值是 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li>0</li><li class="correct">1</li><li>2</li><li>3</li></ul></li><li class="quiz false"><p>自增、自减运算可以用于变量，也可以用于常量和表达式。</p></li><li a&lt;x</code></li><li><code>!(a&gt;=x)&amp;&amp;!(x&gt;b)</code></li><li class="correct"><code>a&lt;x&lt;=b</code></li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>若有 <code>a=1</code> ， <code>b=2</code> ，则表达式 class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li>操作数乘以 2</li><li class="correct">操作数除以 2</li><li>操作数乘以 4</li><li>操作数除以 4</li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>n 目运算符的含义是 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li class="correct">对 n 个数据进行操作</li><li>对 n 个数据进行加法</li><li>对 n 个类型进行整合</li><li>对 n 个类型进行转换</li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>若有 <code>a=2</code> ， <code>b=4</code> ， <code>c=5</code> ，则条件表达式 <code>a&gt;b?a:b&gt;c?a:c</code> 的值为 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li>0</li><li>2</li><li>4</li><li class="correct">5</li></ul></li><li class="quiz"><p>以下非法的赋值语句是 <span class="quiz"><p>有如下表达式 <code>19/3*sqrt(4.0)/5</code> ，则该表达式值数据类型为 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li><code>int</code></li><li><code>float</code></li><li class="correct"><code>double</code></li><li>不确定</li></ul></li></ol><h1 id="单元测试"><a class="anchor" href="#单元测试">#</a> 单元测试</h1><h2 id="第1次"><a class="anchor" href="#第1次">#</a> 第 1 次</h2><ol><li class="quiz"><p>设 x，y，z 为整型数，下列各式中，运算结果与 <code>x=y=24</code> 的表达式相同的是 <span class="gap"></span> 。</p><ul class="options"><li class="correct"><code>x=y=(z=8,4*6)</code></li><li><code>x=y=z=8, 4*6</code></li><li><code>x- (y=z= 8),4*6</code></li><li><code>x=(y=z=8,4*6)</code></li></ul><blockquote><ul class="options"><li>逗号表达式的值是最后一个表达式的值，逗号表达式的优先级最低。连等时，等号的结合方向是自右向左的。先计算右边表达式的值，向左赋值，等号表达式的值是等号右边表达式的值。</li><li>都是 8</li><li>这里 x 没有被赋值，y、z 是 8</li><li>x 为 24，y、z 是 8</li></ul></blockquote></li><li fill"><p>如果定义 <code>int e=8; double f=6.4, g=8.9;</code> ，则表达式 <code>f+int(e/3*int(f+g)/2)%4</code> 的值为 <span class="gap">9.4</span>。</p><blockquote><p>注意运算顺序和数据类型</p></blockquote></li></ol><h1 keyword">return</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token punctuation">}</span><br></pre></div></figure><h2 id="题目3-压缩存储10分"><a class="anchor" href="#题目3-压缩存储10分">#</a> 题目 3. 压缩存储（10 分）</h2><ul><li><strong>题目内容</strong><br>使用一个 int 变量（一般为 4 字节），保存 4 个均不超过 255 的非负整数，输出这个 int 变量的值。例如输入 1 2 3 4，输出 16909060。</li><li><strong>输入格式</strong><br>4 个不超过 255 的非负整数，中间用空格隔开。</li><li><strong>输出格式</strong><br>一个整数。四个整数放在一个 int 变量中，当一个整数看待的值。</li><li><strong>输入样例</strong><br>1 2 3 4</li><li><strong>输出样例</strong><br>16909060</li></ul><blockquote><p>技巧提示：使用移位运算。</p></blockquote><h3 id="解题代码-20"><a class="anchor" href="#解题代码-20">#</a> 解题代码</h3><figure class="highlight cpp"><figcaption><span class="lang">C++</span></figcaption><div class="code-container"><pre class="gutter">1<br>2<br>3<br>4<br>5<br>6<br>7<br>8<br>9<br>10<br>11<br>12<br>13<br></pre><pre class="code"><span class="token macro property">#<span class="token directive keyword">include</span><span class="token string">&lt;iostream></span></span><br><span class="token keyword">using</span> class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token punctuation">,</span>d<span class="token punctuation">,</span>s<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> cin<span class="token class="token operator">=</span>a<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token number">24</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> b<span class="token operator">=</span>b<span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token number">16</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> c<span class="token operator">=</span>c<span string">&lt;iostream></span></span><br><span class="token keyword">using</span> <span class="token keyword">namespace</span> std<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br><span class="token keyword">int</span> <span class="token function">main</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><br><span class="token punctuation">{</span><br> <span class="token keyword">int</span> a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">,</span>c<span class="token punctuation">,</span>d<span class="token punctuation">;</span><br> cin<span class="token operator">>></span>a<span class="token operator">>></span>b<span class="token operator">>></span>c<span class="token operator">>></span>d<span
